make sense of the language or meal descriptions, or you could take a more
educated approach and log onto TravelGrub.com. 
Launched in 2013, TravelGrub provides users with an international food database with ratings and reviews of dishes from all over the world. TravelGrub can not only be used in helping one pick out a dish but also in spelling, pronunciation and a source of ingredients for allergies or food-related sensitivities. Users have the chance to be their own food critique, rate the dishes and write their own reviews.How It WorksOnce on Travelgrub.com, you can
either use the search bar or the interactive map to find the dish or region
you’re looking for. For instance, say you’re traveling to Bolivia. First, you’d
click South America on the map, before narrowing in on the country.  From there you could select a
particular kind of food (i.e. Dairy), or, if you’re looking to see the complete
selection, click ‘All.’ Then, you’d go to the bottom of the page and select ‘Start
Search.’  From there, you’d be
presented with an array of different dishes, some with descriptions and reviews
already in place.  By clicking on
them, one can see how different users have  tried the same dishes, what they liked
and disliked, traits of the dish, and their overall rating.  Users can assign each dish a food score and the scores are averaged within the 
region to show what the most popular dishes are anywhere in the world. If you’re like me, a visual of the food
helps me in my decisions, and many of the reviews are sure to include one.
Our Impact
TravelGrub can change the way the world sees food when we travel. With 257 countries and over 24,000 food entries, TravelGrub is a 
place where travelers and food enthusiasts can find truly local and 
must-have dishes anywhere in the world based on reviews from people just
 like you. Now, what makes us different from Yelp?TravelGrub is more about the dishes themselves in a country and how they fit into the culture, not about specific restaurants that serve the local cuisine. TravelGrub was created to enhance and compliment one's overall travel experience.We provide the necessary information one may need whether it be ingredients, pronunciation of the dish or even how to place your order. No longer will one be stuck, pointing at a menu guessing what to order. With TravelGrub's vast database, travelers can confidently order, try exciting new dishes anywhere in the world and know the local authentic must-have delicacies of any region!Use Of Funds
Website Development & Improvement
App Development
Design Mobile App Screens
Develop the Back-end
Test
Deploy
What We Need & What You GetTravelGrub has come a long way with as tight of a budget as possible 
in an effort to prove the concept. Now that we have seen how popular 
this idea is with little to no marketing or media exposure, we know that
 with the team we have now, we can develop a state of the art website 
and app all with a little extra help. Our idea will change the way we travel and see food! We want to help 
the world understand and identify the must-have dishes anywhere in the 
world and with your help and donation can we do so. Think of us as the 
TripAdvisor of food, anywhere you go! How useful is that?!With your help we're hoping to raise enough funds to turn the already popular TravelGrub.com into a modern and more user friendly website and develop a mobile app for international foodies on the go. That way, wherever users are they can access TravelGrub!What Can You Do To Help? We need funding and social media support! In return, investors will not 
only end up with a great app but they will also be able to follow our 
progress as the company grows. Not to mention access to our soon-to-be 
TravelGrub (TG) Pocket Guides which include anything and everything 
about delicious foods from any country in the world.
Use the Indiegogo
share tools to help TravelGrub get the word out about our latest campaign.
Remember, if you have travel plans on the horizon, visit TravelGrub.com
to get an idea of all the dishes you’d like to try.
Don't forget to like and follow us for the latest info on all things food-related. 
Like Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Travelgrubcom

Send us a tweet: @TravelGrub Instagram: http://instagram.com/travelgrub
For any comments, questions, concerns: Contact Forrest at forrestgalante@gmail.comTwitter: @ForrestGalante 
Our Story 
My name is Forrest Galante. Exploring and traveling the world has been a
 big part of my life and is one of my greatest passions. Growing up in 
Harare, Zimbabwe, I spent time exploring the depths of the African 
safari. Furthering my interests in the outdoors and primitive survival 
in my studies I have traveled to over 36 countries. I even stripped down
 to my skinnies to become a competitor on Discovery Channel's hit show, "Naked and Afraid" last fall.I
 believe travel provides an opportunity to open yourself up to new ideas
 and to let go of your culinary inhibitions. From my experiences, I wanted to provide other 
explorers like myself with a resource based on their location anywhere in the world. A place where they 
could share their dining experiences  and provide their thoughts to 
better prepare others.
The entire TravelGrub team has worked tirelessly to get to where we are now. As a labor of love for this project, everyone has worked for free and completely out of pocket to help people all over the world have amazing culinary experiences. By donating to the campaign, you will show us that you believe in our product as well and that you want to help share the love of exotic and exciting food.
The biggest challenge when starting any business like this is 
getting the word out there, we believe this concept sells itself, 
but people need to find out about it in order for it grow! So help us get the word out! :)
 Eat on. #travelgrub

story:
Thank you to all of our Indiegogo supporters - We're in business!

 

Power Toothpaste is shipping now from www.powertoothpaste.com. Place your order now and get a rush while you brush.

 

The new tubes have been manufactured, and the toothpaste tastes great - not to mention provides a perfect boost. We can't wait to hear what you think!

 

 

 

 

Introducing Power Toothpaste™

 

 

 

 
Power Toothpaste is the world’s first caffeine-infused toothpaste that gives you a rush while you brush, providing a much-needed boost in the first few minutes after waking up. A single tube comes with enough toothpaste for up to 90 brushes. Unlike coffee, which takes 30-45 minutes to fully absorb into your system, Power Toothpaste takes effect almost immediately. You'll feel energized and alert before you've even finished brushing.
 

 

 

 

 
Mornings suck. Most of us feel like zombies for the first hour of our day. But it doesn't have to be this way. Power Toothpaste eliminates morning grogginess just minutes after waking up.
 

 

Power Toothpaste is more than just a toothpaste. Power Toothpaste is the world's first toothpaste that not only cleans your teeth, but gives you the energy that you need to take on the world, one morning at a time.

 

 

 

 

Traditional oral care products are boring. For most people, oral care is a chore, something they do because they feel they have to. And 50% of Americans don't brush twice a day. Our mission is to turn oral care into something people can get excited about. Brushing your teeth should be an indispensable part of your morning routine.

Power Toothpaste doesn't deliver a megablast of caffeine, but provides a subtle buzz, increasing focus and alertness, all without a crash. Regular coffee drinkers who use our toothpaste still enjoy their morning cup of coffee – the difference is they feel great as they are getting ready and don’t find themselves staring anxiously at a coffee machine, waiting for it to slowly finish brewing.

 

 

     

    Power Toothpaste beats plaque and tartar buildup in the same way as the leading brands. Not to mention that Power Toothpaste whitens your teeth, compared to coffee which stains and darkens. But this toothpaste does more than just give you a minty-clean smile. 

    Power Toothpaste gives you a rush while you brush, whenever you need it most. Brush just after waking up to blast away morning grogginess in minutes. Brush mid-day to relieve yourself of post-lunch drowsiness, or to refocus before that big meeting. Burning the midnight oil? Brush at night to stay energized and on your A-game.

     

     

     

     

    Sorry Starbucks.
     
    One brush with Power Toothpaste gives you the same energy boost as a cup of coffee, and much quicker. The tubes we're selling here on Indiegogo provide up to  90 brushes. That's 90 cups of coffee, and up to $245 saved.

     

     

     

     

     

     

    VICE Motherboard

    Caffeinated Toothpaste Is the Closest You'll Ever Get to Mainlining Coffee

    "Power Toothpaste is... meant as a quick jolt to take you out of your morning fog, and in that regard, it works well."
     

    Gear Diary

    Power Toothpaste Has Been Turbocharging My Mornings!

    "Power Toothpaste definitely helps... on days I’ve used it, I still drank my cup of coffee but didn’t feel the need to dive for the coffee machine as soon as I turned on my computer. And on weekends, I haven’t even noticed I skipped my coffee if I used the Power Toothpaste first thing in the morning. "
     

     

     

    What I Drink At Work

    Power Toothpaste Review

    "This toothpaste is so minty that it gives you a much fresher and longer lasting fresh breath than my normal peppermint Colgate®... If you weren't told that this is caffeinated toothpaste, you would have thought that this is just another intensely minty, good ol' toothpaste."
     

    Have A Namaste

    Power Toothpaste: toothpaste with a kick

    "Using the toothpaste first thing in the morning made a real difference. By the time I got out of the shower, I was feeling pretty alert. I even found I didn’t need as much coffee once I got to the office."
     

    Wreckless Eating

    "It's just like a regular toothpaste, but they bumped it up a notch."
    Wreckless Eating's review of a sample-size tube of Power Toothpaste.

     

     

     

    We asked some people to brush with Power Toothpaste for the first time, and recorded their reactions immediately afterwards.

    "I'm really into the taste... I'm getting a little bit jazzed up right now. This is awesome."

    Dave, Business Consultant

     

    "I definitely feel more awake... I always have a cup of coffee in the morning when I wake up, and I could definitely see this replacing it."

     

    Nikki, PR Professional

     

    "I'm not super familiar with the idea of Power Toothpaste, you put caffeine in toothpaste? That's a really good idea. I just have to say that, that's a really freakin' good idea. People should give you money."

     

    Chris, Musician

     

    "I think I'm starting to feel the effects. I had a very drowsy morning, but I think after this I'm ready to tackle the rest of the day."

    Chimmy, Teacher


    **Note: Free shipping included with all US orders!** 

    See our Perk Details section below for more information about all of these perks.

     

     

    You'll be purchasing tubes of Power Toothpaste that are 2.5 fl. oz. in size and good for up to 90 brushing sessions! We recommend brushing with slightly larger than a pea-sized amount of Power Toothpaste, which contains about 80 mg of caffeine.

    This Caffeine Informer article has additional details about Power's specifications and caffeine content: http://www.caffeineinformer.com/caffeine-content/caffeine-toothpaste

    The ingredients in Power Toothpaste don't deviate much from what you'd normally see in a toothpaste (besides the caffeine, of course): Glycerin, sorbitol, silica, water, caffeine, xylitol, calcium carbonate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, flavor, titanium dioxide, xanthan gum, menthol, citric acid, sodium citrate, and sodium laurel sulfate.

     

    Here's an example of tubes from our first production batch of travel-size tubes. The larger 2.5 fl. oz. tube will look similar to this, but the design will be printed on the tube rather than on a label, with quality similar to that of your typical premium toothpaste. Our tube manufacturing partner has produced tubes for some of the world's largest companies, including Colgate®.

     

     

     

     

    In order to kick this project off, we're selling tubes of Power Toothpaste on Indiegogo for a lower price than they will sell for online in the future.

    We've finished formulating our toothpaste, signed the manufacturing contracts, and ordered thousands of tubes in advance of this Indiegogo campaign. Our prototype order of thousands of travel-size tubes went off without a hitch. The funds we raise in this campaign will allow us to manufacture our first large production run of full-size tubes of Power Toothpaste. Our campaign goal of $42,500 represents the amount we need to raise in order to place this first large production order, offer our toothpaste at an attractive price, and continue to be able to sell Power Toothpaste to anyone who wants it after this campaign has completed. If we don't reach our goal, you'll get your money back.

    If we exceed our funding goal, the extra funds will go towards:

    • Accelerating our timeline for shipment of Indiegogo perks.
    • Growing our ability to turn Power Toothpaste into a self-sustaining business, long after the end of this Indiegogo campaign.
    • Developing additional products focused on both improving personal health and giving people the power they need to accomplish their goals. We already have a nighttime toothpaste in the works, and raising additional funds on Indiegogo will help us bring this idea to fruition!
     

     

    Here's a snapshot of some of the travel-size tubes we produced with our manufacturer, in preparation for our full-size tube production batch.

     

    *Early Bird* Tubes: Get in early for the best pricing on a single tube of Power Toothpaste. Limited availability.

     

    Double Your Power: $25 gets you two tubes of Power Toothpaste, a 17% discount.

    5x Power Toothpaste: $49 gets you five tubes of Power Toothpaste, a 34% discount. Also, we're throwing in two high-quality, soft-bristled toothbrushes with the Power logo. 

    10x Power Toothpaste: Get your toothpaste right away! $99 gets you ten (10) tubes of Power Toothpaste, a 34% discount. This package includes two toothbrushes, and *Quick Sample Shipping*. We'll ship an additional travel-size tube to you immediately after the end of this Indiegogo campaign. See more details on Quick Sample Shipping below.

     

     

    The Innovator, Dreamer, and Lifestyle Packages

    We consider those who purchase the Innovator, Dreamer, and Lifestyle Packages instrumental to our mission of bringing Power Toothpaste to life. As a way of saying thank you, we're making you an honorary co-founder of Power Toothpaste. Being a co-founder of a caffeinated toothpaste company comes with some pretty sweet perks!

     

    The Innovator Package includes everything in the 10x Power Toothpaste package and more:

     

    • You'll get 12x tubes of Power Toothpaste, with Quick Sample Shipping (see below for details), and two toothbrushes.
    • Lifetime discount: You can buy Power Toothpaste at $10 a tube, forever, after this campaign ends. 
    • Business cards: A set of 50 high-quality, double-sided business cards, listing you as a co-founder of Power Toothpaste.

    • Website thank-you: We're setting aside a special section of our website to thank you personally for being a co-founder of Power Toothpaste and helping to bring this product to life.
    • T-shirt: A super-soft Power-branded t-shirt to let everyone know that your toothpaste is better than theirs. It's a great way to support a product you helped create! We'll follow up with you for size and style.

     

    The Dreamer Package includes everything in The Innovator Package and more:

    • You'll get 12x tubes of Power Toothpaste with Quick Sample Shipping, two toothbrushes, the lifetime discount of $10/tube, business cards, a website thank-you, and our t-shirt.
    • Free first-run tubes: Every time we develop a new toothpaste product (and we've got several ideas in the pipeline), we'll send you a tube from the first prototype run completely free, before it's available for purchase. We'll solicit your feedback on new products. We like to take care of our co-founders and we value their input.
    • Desk nameplate: A Power Toothpaste co-founder deserves a nice nameplate to put at their desk.

     

     

    The Lifestyle Package includes everything in The Dreamer and Innovator Packages and more:
    • You'll get 12x tubes of Power Toothpaste with Quick Sample Shipping, the lifetime discount of $10/tube, two toothbrushes, business cards, a website thank-you, our t-shirt, free first-run tubes, and your own desk nameplate.
    • Brush with the founders: Schedule an early-morning brushing session with the founders of Power Toothpaste. We'll meet over video-chat and discuss anything you'd like, from the inner-workings of the cosmetics industry to what it takes to bring a new product to market.
    • Power bathrobe: Live the Power Lifestyle. Here at Power Toothpaste, we think you should look as good as you feel in the morning, and what better way to do this than with a plush, premium Power-branded bathrobe?
     

     

    ** The Co-Founder's Package **

    You may notice we didn't include the Co-Founder's Package in our perk chart above. This is because it didn't fit!

     

    Those who purchase the Co-Founder's Package are our biggest supporters and honorary co-founders. The Co-Founder's Package includes everything in the Dreamer and Lifestyle Packages and more:

    • You'll get a whopping thirty (30) tubes of Power Toothpaste with Quick Sample Shipping, two toothbrushes, the lifetime discount of $10/tube, business cards, a website thank-you, our t-shirt, free first-run tubes, your own desk nameplate, a plush power bathrobe, and an opportunity to brush with the founders.
    • Choose your own title: We let you choose your title, which appears on your business cards, desk nameplate, and our website, and t-shirt. Ever wanted to be a Director of Caffeine Tolerance Testing? Now you can! 
    • An important book: A book about innovation and disrupting big corporations, that inspired us to create Power Toothpaste, signed by the founders.
    • BBQ: An invitation to the Power Toothpaste Annual Family Barbecue!
     

     

     

    ** Quick Sample Shipping **

    If you choose a perk with quick sample shipping, we'll ship an additional travel-size tube to you immediately after the end of this Indiegogo campaign. This means you won't have to wait for our manufacturer to fill the large-scale order we're placing with our Indiegogo-raised funds. We've got these travel-size tubes on-hand now and ready to ship to you.

     

     

    Some footage of our travel-size sample tubes being labeled by our manufacturer.

     

     

     

     

    International Supporters

    To our international contributors, thank you for your support! We're happy to ship Power Toothpaste anywhere in the world - just make sure to add the $15 shipping that comes up when you add a shipping address outside of the United States. To keep things simple, you will be responsible for making sure Power Toothpaste can be delivered to your country, and any additional customs charges and regulations, should they apply.

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    We think of ourselves as a technology startup, but we don't write code or build apps. Our product, Power Toothpaste, is the world’s first toothpaste to contain caffeine. We treat toothpaste with the spirit of innovation seen much more commonly in Silicon Valley and far too rarely in the corporate behemoths of personal care. Toothpaste is a technology product that helps people clean and care for their teeth… but we believe a toothpaste can and should do more. With Power Toothpaste, you get a rush while you brush™.

     

    The idea behind Power was birthed by an experience many can relate to. When Founder Dan Meropol went in for his regular dentistry check-up, his dentist told him that his teeth looked great but that he hadn't been flossing enough. Dan had heard this before, but it hadn't stuck. He did some online research, and was surprised to learn from an ADA study that only half of Americans floss daily, and half of Americans only brush once per day.

    Dan set out to find a way to get people to take better care of their teeth, and gave his friend Ian a call. Ian had recently been thinking about how terrible he felt in the mornings, and in a stroke of genius suggested a caffeinated toothpaste.

    We realized there was a way to both encourage better oral care and solve the problem of morning grogginess. Ian quickly found himself making the very first version of Power Toothpaste in his kitchen.

    Ian got to work formulating and perfecting the flavor of Power Toothpaste. Ian and Dan shared the first version of their toothpaste with their friends and family, and it quickly became evident they were on to something. Their friends demanded it and wanted to buy it, but Ian’s kitchen set- up couldn’t grow anywhere close to the demand they were receiving. It became clear that caffeinated toothpaste needed to become a real product, and they took it upon themselves to turn Power Toothpaste into a bonafide business. After a year of hard work, Power Toothpaste is ready to hit the shelves.

     

     

     

    Ian Nappier and Dan Meropol, co-founders of Power Toothpaste. Dan is a Mac. Ian is a PC.

     

     

    We didn’t want to be one of those crowdfunding campaigns that take months and months to ship. Our supporters deserve better. That’s why we’ve put significant time and financial investment behind Power Toothpaste before we ever brought it to Indiegogo.

     

     

     

     

     

    American oral hygiene is abysmal: 50% of Americans don't brush twice a day. For most people, oral care is a chore, something they do because they feel they have to. Our mission is to make being healthy an exciting and integral part of the morning routine. We want to make brushing your teeth an indispensable part of your morning, something that not only cleans your teeth but gives you the boost you need to take on the day.

    80% of the toothpaste sold in the US is produced by two multibillion-dollar conglomerates, which haven't innovated in decades. Traditional oral care is a lackluster experience. The products are boring and unimaginative. We think you deserve better from your toothpaste, and have re-imagined what a toothpaste can be. This is a toothpaste that does more, and helps you do more. A toothpaste that gives you the energy you need to take on your day.

    Power Toothpaste is a new kind of toothpaste. A toothpaste for people with big ideas. A toothpaste for dreamers (and deep sleepers). A toothpaste for people who wake up and want to change the world.

     

     

    A shot of our prototype travel-size tubes being sealed by our manufacturer.

     

     

     

     

     

                                                                      

     

    		 Dan
    Dan heads up operations for Power Toothpaste, and 
    makes sure the toothpaste train is running on schedule.
    He starts his day by brushing with Power Toothpaste on a soft-bristled brush.

     

     

     

     

     

     

                                           

     

    		 Ian
    Ian formulated the first version of Power Toothpaste in his kitchen, now he leads Power Toothpaste's logistics and supply-chain. He replaces his toothbrush every two to four months, or sooner if the bristles are frayed.

     

     

    		  

     

     

    		  

     

      • The safety and healthfulness of our toothpaste is our number one priority. We’ve been working with dentists, industry insiders, and expert formulators to ensure the highest quality product. Plus, our toothpaste is made in America, in FDA and CGMP-compliant facilities. We’ve visited our manufacturing partner in person to inspect it and meet with its staff. 
      • If things go as planned, we're going to be mailing out a lot of toothpaste orders. We're working with a fulfillment partner to ship the bulk of the simpler orders from this campaign. We'll be fulfilling the larger and more complex orders by hand, to make sure everyone gets exactly what they ordered.
      • The production order we place after this campaign will be our biggest yet. As with any large manufacturing project, things can go wrong in unexpected ways. To get ahead of any issues, we ran a smaller production run of travel-size tubes following the same techniques and processes that will be used in our future production batches. We've ironed out the kinks, received great feedback on those tubes (see the press reviews and testimonials above) and are confident that our subsequent, larger orders will run smoothly.
     
     
    Here's some of the work we've done with our tube supplier to make sure our tubes are ready to be manufactured and printed:
     

     

     

     

     

    I like having coffee, is this going to replace my morning ritual?

    Not necessarily! Most of our friends who regularly drink coffee find they still enjoy their morning cup of joe, but also enjoy getting their day going as soon as soon as they start brushing. Some of them have reported drinking slightly less coffee, and some of our friends who don’t drink coffee regularly have cut down after using Power Toothpaste. So it really depends on you!

    How does it work?

    Power Toothpaste is fortified with caffeine, just like your coffee. When you brush, your tongue and gums absorb the caffeine. You'll find you feel a boost much quicker than from coffee or energy drinks, which absorb through the stomach. You don’t need to swallow, so just brush normally, with the same amount of toothpaste as you normally would.

    Is Power Toothpaste safe to use?

    Absolutely! Caffeine is the only ingredient in Power Toothpaste that you wouldn't find in your standard toothpaste. Each pea-sized amount of Power Toothpaste contains slightly less than the amount of caffeine as in a medium cup of coffee. Of course, if you are very sensitive to caffeine or have a preexisting medical condition, we'd recommend consulting a medical professional before brushing with Power Toothpaste.

    What about nighttime? Do I need a second tube of toothpaste?

    We don’t recommend using Power Toothpaste at night (unless you're trying to stay up), and for now you should use your standard toothpaste. But stay tuned! We are hard at work developing a nighttime version of Power Toothpaste.

    How often can I brush?

    We don't recommend brushing with Power Toothpaste more than three times a day. Use your judgment.

    What does it taste like?

    We formulated Power Toothpaste to taste like most toothpastes on the market, and we ended up with something we think tastes better, mintier, and fresher than the toothpastes we've used before. Check out these testimonials for a closer look!

    Does Power Toothpaste contain fluoride?

    Power Toothpaste is a fluoride-free toothpaste. We understand that many people out there would prefer a fluoridated toothpaste. We'd like to additionally offer a fluoridated version, but the cost and complexity of manufacturing a fluoridated toothpaste are much higher, and we didn't want to set our campaign goal any higher than it needed to be. If you help us get Power Toothpaste off of the ground, we'll work hard to develop a fluoridated version to compliment our fluoride-free toothpaste.
     

    Even if you can't contribute financially, it doesn't mean you can't help! For Power Toothpaste to succeed, we need to get our campaign in front of as many people as possible. Please share with your friends using the share buttons on the left-hand side of your screen.

     

    From the press? You can learn more, get media assets, and read our press release at press.powertoothpaste.com, or email us at press@powertoothpaste.com. We'd love to hear from you!

Have A Namaste
Power Toothpaste: toothpaste with a kick"Using the toothpaste first thing in the morning made a real difference. By the time I got out of the shower, I was feeling pretty alert. I even found I didn’t need as much coffee once I got to the office."
 

Wreckless Eating"It's just like a regular toothpaste, but they bumped it up a notch."
Wreckless Eating's review of a sample-size tube of Power Toothpaste.


 

 
 

We asked some people to brush with Power Toothpaste for the first time, and recorded their reactions immediately afterwards.

"I'm really into the taste... I'm getting a little bit jazzed up right now. This is awesome."
Dave, Business Consultant
 


"I definitely feel more awake... I always have a cup of coffee in the morning when I wake up, and I could definitely see this replacing it."
 
Nikki, PR Professional
 


"I'm not super familiar with the idea of Power Toothpaste, you put caffeine in toothpaste? That's a really good idea. I just have to say that, that's a really freakin' good idea. People should give you money." 
Chris, Musician
 

"I think I'm starting to feel the effects. I had a very drowsy morning, but I think after this I'm ready to tackle the rest of the day."
Chimmy, Teacher




**Note: Free shipping included with all US orders!** 


See our Perk Details section below for more information about all of these perks.
 
 

You'll be purchasing tubes of Power Toothpaste that are 2.5 fl. oz. in size and good for up to 90 brushing sessions! We recommend brushing with slightly larger than a pea-sized amount of Power Toothpaste, which contains about 80 mg of caffeine.
This Caffeine Informer article has additional details about Power's specifications and caffeine content: http://www.caffeineinformer.com/caffeine-content/caffeine-toothpaste
The ingredients in Power Toothpaste don't deviate much from what you'd normally see in a toothpaste (besides the caffeine, of course): Glycerin, sorbitol, silica, water, caffeine, xylitol, calcium carbonate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, flavor, titanium dioxide, xanthan gum, menthol, citric acid, sodium citrate, and sodium laurel sulfate. 
Here's an example of tubes from our first production batch of travel-size tubes. The larger 2.5 fl. oz. tube will look similar to this, but the design will be printed on the tube rather than on a label, with quality similar to that of your typical premium toothpaste. Our tube manufacturing partner has produced tubes for some of the world's largest companies, including Colgate®. 
 
 
 

In order to kick this project off, we're selling tubes of Power Toothpaste on Indiegogo for a lower price than they will sell for online in the future.
We've finished formulating our toothpaste, signed the manufacturing contracts, and ordered thousands of tubes in advance of this Indiegogo campaign. Our prototype order of thousands of travel-size tubes went off without a hitch. The funds we raise in this campaign will allow us to manufacture our first large production run of full-size tubes of Power Toothpaste. Our campaign goal of $42,500 represents the amount we need to raise in order to place this first large production order, offer our toothpaste at an attractive price, and continue to be able to sell Power Toothpaste to anyone who wants it after this campaign has completed. If we don't reach our goal, you'll get your money back.
If we exceed our funding goal, the extra funds will go towards:

Accelerating our timeline for shipment of Indiegogo perks.
Growing our ability to turn Power Toothpaste into a self-sustaining business, long after the end of this Indiegogo campaign.
Developing additional products focused on both improving personal health and giving people the power they need to accomplish their goals. We already have a nighttime toothpaste in the works, and raising additional funds on Indiegogo will help us bring this idea to fruition!

 
 
 Here's a snapshot of some of the travel-size tubes we produced with our manufacturer, in preparation for our full-size tube production batch.  

*Early Bird* Tubes: Get in early for the best pricing on a single tube of Power Toothpaste. Limited availability.


 
Double Your Power: $25 gets you two tubes of Power Toothpaste, a 17% discount.
5x Power Toothpaste: $49 gets you five tubes of Power Toothpaste, a 34% discount. Also, we're throwing in two high-quality, soft-bristled toothbrushes with the Power logo. 
10x Power Toothpaste: Get your toothpaste right away! $99 gets you ten (10) tubes of Power Toothpaste, a 34% discount. This package includes two toothbrushes, and *Quick Sample Shipping*. We'll ship an additional travel-size tube to you immediately after the end of this Indiegogo campaign. See more details on Quick Sample Shipping below.

 
 
The Innovator, Dreamer, and Lifestyle PackagesWe consider those who purchase the Innovator, Dreamer, and Lifestyle Packages instrumental to our mission of bringing Power Toothpaste to life. As a way of saying thank you, we're making you an honorary co-founder of Power Toothpaste. Being a co-founder of a caffeinated toothpaste company comes with some pretty sweet perks! 
The Innovator Package includes everything in the 10x Power Toothpaste package and more:
 

You'll get 12x tubes of Power Toothpaste, with Quick Sample Shipping (see below for details), and two toothbrushes.

Lifetime discount: You can buy Power Toothpaste at $10 a tube, forever, after this campaign ends. 

Business cards: A set of 50 high-quality, double-sided business cards, listing you as a co-founder of Power Toothpaste.




Website thank-you: We're setting aside a special section of our website to thank you personally for being a co-founder of Power Toothpaste and helping to bring this product to life.

T-shirt: A super-soft Power-branded t-shirt to let everyone know that your toothpaste is better than theirs. It's a great way to support a product you helped create! We'll follow up with you for size and style.


 
The Dreamer Package includes everything in The Innovator Package and more:


You'll get 12x tubes of Power Toothpaste with Quick Sample Shipping, two toothbrushes, the lifetime discount of $10/tube, business cards, a website thank-you, and our t-shirt.

Free first-run tubes: Every time we develop a new toothpaste product (and we've got several ideas in the pipeline), we'll send you a tube from the first prototype run completely free, before it's available for purchase. We'll solicit your feedback on new products. We like to take care of our co-founders and we value their input.

Desk nameplate: A Power Toothpaste co-founder deserves a nice nameplate to put at their desk.


 
 



The Lifestyle Package includes everything in The Dreamer and Innovator Packages and more:


You'll get 12x tubes of Power Toothpaste with Quick Sample Shipping, the lifetime discount of $10/tube, two toothbrushes, business cards, a website thank-you, our t-shirt, free first-run tubes, and your own desk nameplate.

Brush with the founders: Schedule an early-morning brushing session with the founders of Power Toothpaste. We'll meet over video-chat and discuss anything you'd like, from the inner-workings of the cosmetics industry to what it takes to bring a new product to market.

Power bathrobe: Live the Power Lifestyle. Here at Power Toothpaste, we think you should look as good as you feel in the morning, and what better way to do this than with a plush, premium Power-branded bathrobe?



 

 
** The Co-Founder's Package **
You may notice we didn't include the Co-Founder's Package in our perk chart above. This is because it didn't fit! 
Those who purchase the Co-Founder's Package are our biggest supporters and honorary co-founders. The Co-Founder's Package includes everything in the Dreamer and Lifestyle Packages and more:

You'll get a whopping thirty (30) tubes of Power Toothpaste with Quick Sample Shipping, two toothbrushes, the lifetime discount of $10/tube, business cards, a website thank-you, our t-shirt, free first-run tubes, your own desk nameplate, a plush power bathrobe, and an opportunity to brush with the founders.

Choose your own title: We let you choose your title, which appears on your business cards, desk nameplate, and our website, and t-shirt. Ever wanted to be a Director of Caffeine Tolerance Testing? Now you can! 

An important book: A book about innovation and disrupting big corporations, that inspired us to create Power Toothpaste, signed by the founders.

BBQ: An invitation to the Power Toothpaste Annual Family Barbecue!


 
 
 
** Quick Sample Shipping **
If you choose a perk with quick sample shipping, we'll ship an additional travel-size tube to you immediately after the end of this Indiegogo campaign. This means you won't have to wait for our manufacturer to fill the large-scale order we're placing with our Indiegogo-raised funds. We've got these travel-size tubes on-hand now and ready to ship to you. 
 

Some footage of our travel-size sample tubes being labeled by our manufacturer.

 
 
  International Supporters
To our international contributors, thank you for your support! We're happy to ship Power Toothpaste anywhere in the world - just make sure to add the $15 shipping that comes up when you add a shipping address outside of the United States. To keep things simple, you will be responsible for making sure Power Toothpaste can be delivered to your country, and any additional customs charges and regulations, should they apply.
 
   







 

  We think of ourselves as a technology startup, but we don't write code or build apps. Our product, Power Toothpaste, is the world’s first toothpaste to contain caffeine. We treat toothpaste with the spirit of innovation seen much more commonly in Silicon Valley and far too rarely in the corporate behemoths of personal care. Toothpaste is a technology product that helps people clean and care for their teeth… but we believe a toothpaste can and should do more. With Power Toothpaste, you get a rush while you brush™. The idea behind Power was birthed by an experience many can relate to. When Founder Dan Meropol went in for his regular dentistry check-up, his dentist told him that his teeth looked great but that he hadn't been flossing enough. Dan had heard this before, but it hadn't stuck. He did some online research, and was surprised to learn from an ADA study that only half of Americans floss daily, and half of Americans only brush once per day.Dan set out to find a way to get people to take better care of their teeth, and gave his friend Ian a call. Ian had recently been thinking about how terrible he felt in the mornings, and in a stroke of genius suggested a caffeinated toothpaste.We realized there was a way to both encourage better oral care and solve the problem of morning grogginess. Ian quickly found himself making the very first version of Power Toothpaste in his kitchen.Ian got to work formulating and perfecting the flavor of Power Toothpaste. Ian and Dan shared the first version of their toothpaste with their friends and family, and it quickly became evident they were on to something. Their friends demanded it and wanted to buy it, but Ian’s kitchen set- up couldn’t grow anywhere close to the demand they were receiving. It became clear that caffeinated toothpaste needed to become a real product, and they took it upon themselves to turn Power Toothpaste into a bonafide business. After a year of hard work, Power Toothpaste is ready to hit the shelves. 
 
 

Ian Nappier and Dan Meropol, co-founders of Power Toothpaste. Dan is a Mac. Ian is a PC.

 
 

We didn’t want to be one of those crowdfunding campaigns that take months and months to ship. Our supporters deserve better. That’s why we’ve put significant time and financial investment behind Power Toothpaste before we ever brought it to Indiegogo.
 

 
 
 
 American oral hygiene is abysmal: 50% of Americans don't brush twice a day. For most people, oral care is a chore, something they do because they feel they have to. Our mission is to make being healthy an exciting and integral part of the morning routine. We want to make brushing your teeth an indispensable part of your morning, something that not only cleans your teeth but gives you the boost you need to take on the day.
80% of the toothpaste sold in the US is produced by two multibillion-dollar conglomerates, which haven't innovated in decades. Traditional oral care is a lackluster experience. The products are boring and unimaginative. We think you deserve better from your toothpaste, and have re-imagined what a toothpaste can be. This is a toothpaste that does more, and helps you do more. A toothpaste that gives you the energy you need to take on your day.
Power Toothpaste is a new kind of toothpaste. A toothpaste for people with big ideas. A toothpaste for dreamers (and deep sleepers). A toothpaste for people who wake up and want to change the world.
 
 

A shot of our prototype travel-size tubes being sealed by our manufacturer.
 




 
 
 
 
                                                                  
 


Dan Dan heads up operations for Power Toothpaste, and makes sure the toothpaste train is running on schedule.He starts his day by brushing with Power Toothpaste on a soft-bristled brush.



 
 
 
 
 
 
                                        


IanIan formulated the first version of Power Toothpaste in his kitchen, now he leads Power Toothpaste's logistics and supply-chain. He replaces his toothbrush every two to four months, or sooner if the bristles are frayed.



 
 

 



 
 

 


 


The safety and healthfulness of our toothpaste is our number one priority. We’ve been working with dentists, industry insiders, and expert formulators to ensure the highest quality product. Plus, our toothpaste is made in America, in FDA and CGMP-compliant facilities. We’ve visited our manufacturing partner in person to inspect it and meet with its staff. 
If things go as planned, we're going to be mailing out a lot of toothpaste orders. We're working with a fulfillment partner to ship the bulk of the simpler orders from this campaign. We'll be fulfilling the larger and more complex orders by hand, to make sure everyone gets exactly what they ordered.
The production order we place after this campaign will be our biggest yet. As with any large manufacturing project, things can go wrong in unexpected ways. To get ahead of any issues, we ran a smaller production run of travel-size tubes following the same techniques and processes that will be used in our future production batches. We've ironed out the kinks, received great feedback on those tubes (see the press reviews and testimonials above) and are confident that our subsequent, larger orders will run smoothly.

 
 
Here's some of the work we've done with our tube supplier to make sure our tubes are ready to be manufactured and printed:
 


 

 

 

 
I like having coffee, is this going to replace my morning ritual?
Not necessarily! Most of our friends who regularly drink coffee find they still enjoy their morning cup of joe, but also enjoy getting their day going as soon as soon as they start brushing. Some of them have reported drinking slightly less coffee, and some of our friends who don’t drink coffee regularly have cut down after using Power Toothpaste. So it really depends on you!
How does it work?
Power Toothpaste is fortified with caffeine, just like your coffee. When you brush, your tongue and gums absorb the caffeine. You'll find you feel a boost much quicker than from coffee or energy drinks, which absorb through the stomach. You don’t need to swallow, so just brush normally, with the same amount of toothpaste as you normally would.
Is Power Toothpaste safe to use?
Absolutely! Caffeine is the only ingredient in Power Toothpaste that you wouldn't find in your standard toothpaste. Each pea-sized amount of Power Toothpaste contains slightly less than the amount of caffeine as in a medium cup of coffee. Of course, if you are very sensitive to caffeine or have a preexisting medical condition, we'd recommend consulting a medical professional before brushing with Power Toothpaste.
What about nighttime? Do I need a second tube of toothpaste?
We don’t recommend using Power Toothpaste at night (unless you're trying to stay up), and for now you should use your standard toothpaste. But stay tuned! We are hard at work developing a nighttime version of Power Toothpaste.
How often can I brush?
We don't recommend brushing with Power Toothpaste more than three times a day. Use your judgment.
What does it taste like?
We formulated Power Toothpaste to taste like most toothpastes on the market, and we ended up with something we think tastes better, mintier, and fresher than the toothpastes we've used before. Check out these testimonials for a closer look!

Does Power Toothpaste contain fluoride?
Power Toothpaste is a fluoride-free toothpaste. We understand that many people out there would prefer a fluoridated toothpaste. We'd like to additionally offer a fluoridated version, but the cost and complexity of manufacturing a fluoridated toothpaste are much higher, and we didn't want to set our campaign goal any higher than it needed to be. If you help us get Power Toothpaste off of the ground, we'll work hard to develop a fluoridated version to compliment our fluoride-free toothpaste.
 
Even if you can't contribute financially, it doesn't mean you can't help! For Power Toothpaste to succeed, we need to get our campaign in front of as many people as possible. Please share with your friends using the share buttons on the left-hand side of your screen.
 
From the press? You can learn more, get media assets, and read our press release at press.powertoothpaste.com, or email us at press@powertoothpaste.com. We'd love to hear from you!

story:
When Albert Murphy opened up on Dundurn Street nearly 40 years ago, he was a young man, taking a chance, on a new business.  But Murphy’s Subs stayed afloat, and both the sandwich shop, and the owner, became a true Hamilton fixture.  But as Scot Urquhart reports, there’ll be a hole in Hamilton’s west end come the new year.  An absence created by the loss of one the city’s most iconic, and best loved, eateries.

Albert Murphy has been doing this since 1976: “A lot of hours. No holidays. Work, work work.”

For 38 years, the man called Murph, and his wife Deirdre have been working side by side. But nothing lasts forever: “I’ll be 68 soon. So, ya gotta stop some time.”

And that time, he says, is very near. Thousands of hungry customers have come and gone from Murphy’s shop, counted in bags of buns: “16 to 18 dozen a day. The best day we ever had, was 27 dozen.”

Let's help Murphy and Deirdre start their retirement on the right foot. All proceeds from this fund raising campaign will go directly to Murphy and Deirdre in the form of a certified cheque. They may choose to do whatever they wish with the money to start their retirement off. I have heard of plans of theirs to travel Europe after retiring and it would be great if we could help start that dream for them.

Albert Murphy has been doing this since 1976: “A lot of hours. No holidays. Work, work work.”
For 38 years, the man called Murph, and his wife Deirdre have been working side by side. But nothing lasts forever: “I’ll be 68 soon. So, ya gotta stop some time.”
And that time, he says, is very near. Thousands of hungry customers have come and gone from Murphy’s shop, counted in bags of buns: “16 to 18 dozen a day. The best day we ever had, was 27 dozen.”
Let's help Murphy and Deirdre start their retirement on the right foot. All proceeds from this fund raising campaign will go directly to Murphy and Deirdre in the form of a certified cheque. They may choose to do whatever they wish with the money to start their retirement off. I have heard of plans of theirs to travel Europe after retiring and it would be great if we could help start that dream for them.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it’s important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it’s going. Be transparent and specific—people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don’t reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Voir Version Française!

Leer en Espanol!



Short Summary

This is a project of two friends Pierre and Jean-Louis! ( and Valparaiso behind us !) 

Pierre le Goff, a 41 years old French entrepreneur. I graduated in cinema ESSRA school. I also run industries in food business and pharmaceutical business. I have lived in Chile for 8 years.

Jean-Louis Laporte. I am 55 years old social entrepreneur and Engineer.  I am volunteer in a cancer patient support association.  I am passionated about humanity and its future. I came to Chile for a period of six months, to be a part of the Start-up Chile program, in order to launch a project called Spotrotter. 

Pierre : “Making a documentary about ONG Puntos Corazon opened my eyes to a closed world that we have neighbors, and we don’t even see them ! Next to us, men and women are suffering a lot just to survive, and a few others are trying to help, to share. I couldn't wake up the morning and just go on living like I didn't see anything! Contributors will give more than just hope : they will give a really strong support to those people living very difficult lives and needing money to continue their missions. It's a constant work, and people living in difficult locations need help constantly, most of all, especially the children.”

Father Laurent Pavec explain us Puntos Corazon in Valparaiso 



Jean-Louis "Pierre took me on a tour of Association Puntos Corazon and I was very touched by the people I encountered in the shanty town of Valparaiso. I met an elderly person named Don Tito who lives alone, without electricity or running water on land made of clay; and, I met a paraplegic named Juan who can no longer move. Volunteers are giving life to these isolated and excluded people from a precious part society of humanity. Unfortunately, they lack a volunteer to be able to visit all those who need it.”


Puntos Corazón

“Puntos Corazon” is catholic international NGO, founded in France in 1990. “Puntos Corazon” mission is to train and send young volunteers to live for 1 or 2 years in the center of a deprived area, to be friend of the lonely and isolated people through a personal one-to-one compassionate approach. They work with the poor, the most wounded and rejected people in the world. They generate and promote a “culture of compassion” which affirms the intrinsic value of every person at all levels of the society through various initiatives in the corporate, political, scientific and artistic spheres.


What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for 10,000 US dollars. All the money will go directly in the ONG Puntos’Corazon bank account.

We will also make reports about how the money is used. The urgent need is to finance one more young volunteer in Valparaiso. The volunteers we currently have are really not enough and we need to finance repairs on house’s floor in the entrance. The floor and walls were severely damaged after the earthquake and they haven’t been able to repair them yet.(7200 USD for one volunteer (600 USD during 12 months) and 2800 USD to repair the house)

All the funds will go to ONG Puntos Corazon in Valparaiso. If we don’t reach the entire goal we will do the vital repairs that are urgent ( 2800 USD)  and we can finance a volunteer but for a  shorter period.

You can get outstanding reward : receive a blessing for your startup or project ! 

Father Laurent, head of Puntos Corazon, has asked us how he could help us because what we do is very useful to them. 

And we had an idea; for all the startups and entrepreneur it is important to start off on the right foot with good luck. So he is going to bless each those who want to be blessed.

Father Laurent proposed  : 

“ The blessing of offices, shops or factories is something common in Latin America where the religious sense is strong and very present among people. Blessing a Start-up and most of all a social Start-up has a strong meaning. It is recognizing that not everything is in our hand as was saying Jean-Louis when he commented something about luck. More over, it is asking god’s help, asking that, as the blessing prayer says, God grants “ His guidance and support to all who plan and conduct those Start-ups, to help them take the right decisions and carry them out fairly, so that by respecting justice and charity, they will see themselves as working for the common good , and find joy in contributing to the progress of the world”.



The Impact

The project helps directly at the people that needed more. Helping this ONG is the best way to be in the field, with them and to see how they reach their goals.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

· Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.

· Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it

Version Française



Aidons la maison d’accueil de Puntos Corazon (Points Cœur) à lutter contre les termites et à financer une mission de volontaire supplémentaire pour soutenir les personnes les plus nécessiteuses de Valparaiso au Chili.

Bref résumé

Ce projet est celui de deux amis, Pierre et Jean-Louis (et de tout Valparaiso derrière eux!).


Pierre Le Goff, entrepreneur français de 41 ans : “Je suis diplômé en cinéma de l’ESSRA. J’ai également effectué un parcours dans l’industrie alimentaire, l’industrie pharmaceutique et la restauration. Je vis au Chili depuis 8 ans”.

Jean-Louis Laporte : “J’ai 55 ans, je suis entrepreneur social et ingénieur. Je suis bénévole dans une association de soutien aux maladies du cancer. Je suis passionné par tout ce qui peut améliorer le futur de l’humanité. Je suis venu au Chili pour une durée de 6 mois, pour participer au programme Start-up Chile et lancer un projet appelé Spotrotter.

Pierre : “La réalisation d’un documentaire sur l’ONG Puntos Corazon ( Points Cœur) m’ a ouvert les yeux sur tout un monde que nous côtoyons et que pourtant nous ne voyons pas! Tout près de nous des hommes et des femmes souffrent et luttent juste pour survivre et quelques autres essaient de les aider et de partager avec eux.  Je ne pouvais plus me réveiller tous les matins et continuer à vivre comme si je n’avais rien vu! Les contributeurs doivent donner plus que de l’espoir : ils doivent apporter une aide concrète à toutes ces personnes confrontées à l’adversité et aux volontaires qui ont besoin de moyens financiers pour mener à bien leurs missions. C’est un travail de chaque jour et les personnes vivant ces difficultés, les enfants en particulier ont besoin d’un soutien constant”.

Jean-Louis : “Pierre m’a présenté l’association Points Coeur et j’ai été particulièrement touché par les personnes que j’ai rencontrées dans les bidonvilles de Valparaiso. J’ai fait la connaissance d’un vieux monsieur, Don Tito, vivant seul sans électricité ni eau courante sur un sol en terre battue. J’ai également rencontré  un paraplégique nommé Juan qui ne peut plus se déplacer. Les volontaires donnent toute leur vie pour ces personnes isolées et quasiment exclues de la société des hommes. Malheureusement, il manqué des volontaires pour visiter tous ceux qui en auraient tant besoin”.

L’association Puntos Corazon (Points Cœur) en quelques mots

“Puntos Corazon” (Points Coeur) est une ONG international fondée en France en 1990. La mission de “Puntos Corazon” est de former et d’envoyer de jeunes volontaires vivre 1 ou 2 ans dans des banlieues défavorisées, et d’apporter compassion et soutien personnalisé aux plus isolés. Ils œuvrent auprès des populations les plus pauvres, les plus vulnérables et les plus exclues du monde. Ils génèrent et répandent une “culture de compassion” qui met en avant la valeur intrinsèque de chaque personne, grâce à diverses initiatives dans le monde de l’entreprise, de la politique, des arts et des sciences.

Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous pouvez faire

Nous avons besoin de 10,000 US dollars. La totalité de cette somme sera versée sur le compte bancaire de l’ONG Puntos Corazon.

Nous ferons des comptes rendus sur l’utilisation de ces fonds.

Le besoin le plus urgent est de financer un jeune volontaire de plus à Valparaiso. Ceux actuellement présents sont en nombre insuffisant. Nous devons également financer les travaux du sol et les murs de l’entrée de la maison sévèrement endommagés par les termites et le dernier tremblement de terre. Les travaux n’ont pas pu être lancés faute de moyens financiers (il faut 600 USD par mois pour un volontaire soit 7,200 USD pour un an , et 2,800 USD pour les travaux de la maison).

Si nous n’obtenons pas la totalité de cette somme, nous ferons en priorité les réparations du bâtiment, car il y a urgence, et nous financerons un volontaire pour une durée plus courte.

Vous pouvez bénéficier d’une récompense hors du commun : la bénédiction de votre start-up ou de votre projet !

Le père Laurent, responsable de Points Cœur, nous a demandé comment il pouvait nous aider car ce que nous faisons est vraiment très utile pour l’association.

Nous avons eu une idée : pour toutes les start-ups, ainsi que pour tous les porteurs de projets, il est important de partir du bon pied et sous une bonne étoile. Le père Laurent a donc décidé de donner sa bénédiction à tous ceux qui le souhaiteront.

Le Père Laurent précise : “Les bénédictions de magasins, de bureaux ou d’entreprises sont courantes en Amérique Latine où le sentiment religieux est très présent dans la population. Bénir une start-up et surtout une start-up à vocation sociale est porteur d’un sens fort. C’est reconnaître que tout notre destin n’est pas entre nos mains, comme le dit si bien Jean-Louis lorsqu’il évoque la Chance. Surtout, c’est demander l’aide de Dieu, et comme le dit le texte de la bénédiction c’est demander “qu’il guide ceux qui dirigent  ces start-ups, les aide à prendre les bonnes décisions et à se comporter de manière équitable. Ainsi, en respectant les principes de justice et charité, ces entrepreneurs auront la conscience de travailler pour le bien commun et le bonheur de contribuer au progrès de l’humanité.”

L’impact

Aider cette ONG en rendant la maison d’accueil dans un état décent et en finançant la mission d’un volontaire supplémentaire est la meilleure manière d’apporter une aide concrète sur le terrain, et d’être à leurs côtés.

Les autres manières d’apporter son aide

Certains ne peuvent pas contribuer financièrement, mais ils peuvent cependant apporter leur aide :

- en demandant autour d’eux de diffuser le message et de faire connaître cette campagne.

Nous comptons sur vous tous, mille merci !!!


Version Espanol:



Ayudemos la casa de acogida de “Puntos Corazón” a luchar contra las termitas y para financiar una misión de voluntarios adicionales para apoyar a los más necesitados de Valparaíso en Chile.

Breve resumen

Este proyecto es de dos amigos, Pierre y Jean -Louis (y de todo Valparaíso detrás de ellos !)

Pierre Le Goff, empresario francés de 41 años: "Me gradué en cine en la Escuela ESSRA. También hice una carrera en la industria alimentaria, la industria farmacéutica y la restauración. Vivo en Chile desde hace 8 años ".

Jean -Louis Laporte : "Tengo 55 años, soy ingeniero del área social y empresario. Soy voluntario en una asociación de apoyo para enfermedades cancerígenas. Soy un apasionado de todo lo que pueda mejorar el futuro de la humanidad. Llegué a Chile por un período de seis meses, para participar en el programa Start-Up Chile y poner en marcha un proyecto llamado Spotrotter.

Pierre : "La realización de un documental sobre la ONG “Puntos Corazón” me abrió los ojos hacia un mundo en el cual vivimos pero que sin embargo no vemos! Cerca de nosotros, existen hombres y mujeres que sufren y luchan para sobrevivir, y otros tratan de ayudar y de compartir con ellos. No podía levantarme cada mañana y seguir viviendo como si no hubiera visto nada! Los colaboradores deben entregar más que esperanza: deben proporcionar una ayuda concreta a todas estas personas que se enfrentan a la adversidad y a los voluntarios que necesitan recursos financieros para llevar a cabo sus misiones. Se trata de un trabajo diario y las personas que viven estas dificultades, y los niños en particular, necesitan un apoyo continuo".

Jean -Louis: "Pierre me presentó la Asociación “Puntos Corazón” y me sentí particularmente conmovido por la gente que conocí en los barrios pobres de Valparaíso. Conocí a un anciano, Don Tito, que vive solo, sin electricidad ni agua corriente, en una casa de piso de barro. También conocí a un hombre parapléjico llamado Juan, que ya no se puede mover. Los voluntarios dan todo para ayudar a estas personas aisladas y prácticamente excluidos de la sociedad humana. Por desgracia, faltan voluntarios para visitar a todos aquellos que tienen tanta necesidad " .

Acerca de Puntos Corazón

"Puntos Corazón" es una ONG católica fundada en Francia en 1990, se representada en 23 países. La Misión de Puntos Corazón  es de formar y enviar jóvenes voluntarios para vivir 1 o 2 años en un barrio marginado, para compartir con gente aislada  y poder acercarse a ellos con una mirada desde la compasión. Ellos trabajan con los pobres, con los mas rechazados y sufridos del mundo. Intentan difundir una "cultura de compasión " que afirma el valor único de cada persona en diferentes ámbitos de la sociedad a través de múlyiples iniciativas en el mundo empresarial, político, científico, y artístico . (http://chile.puntoscorazon.org )

Lo que necesitamos y lo que Usted puede hacer

Necesitamos 10.000 dólares. El importe total se abonará a la cuenta bancaria de la ONG Puntos Corazón. Realizaremos informes sobre el uso de estos fondos. La necesidad más urgente es la de financiar un joven voluntario más en Valparaíso. Los actualmente presentes son escasos. También tenemos que apoyar los arreglos del suelo y paredes de la entrada de la casa que ha sido muy dañada por las termitas y el último terremoto. Los trabajos no se pudieron iniciar debido a la falta de financiamiento (necesidad de 600 dólares mensuales para un voluntario, es decir 7.200 dólares por año y 2.800 dólares para los trabajos de la casa).

Si no conseguimos la suma completa, vamos a dar prioridad a la reparación del edificio, dado que hay urgencia en ello,  y financiaremos un voluntario por una duración más corta.

Usted recibirá un premio fuera de lo común: la bendición de su Start-up o de su proyecto!

El Padre Laurent, responsable de la Asociación Puntos Corazón, nos preguntó cómo nos podía ayudar ya que lo que hacíamos era realmente útil para la asociación.

Tuvimos una idea: para todas las Start-up, así como para todos los titulares de los proyectos, es importante empezar bien y con una buena estrella. El Padre Laurent decidió entonces dar su bendición a todos los que lo deseen.

El Padre Laurent Pavec dice: :  "Las bendiciones de tiendas, oficinas o negocios son comunes en América Latina, donde el sentimiento religioso está muy presente en la gente. Bendecir una Start-up y sobre todo una start-up con vocación social conlleva un sentido fuerte, importante. Es reconocer que todo nuestro destino no está en nuestras manos, como lo menciona Jean-Louis cuando habla de la Suerte. Sobre todo, es pedir la ayuda de Dios y, como dice el texto de la bendición es pedir "que EL guíe a los que dirigen estas Start-ups, que los ayude a tomar las decisiones correctas y a comportarse justamente. Así, de acuerdo con los principios de la justicia y de la caridad, estos emprendedores tienen la conciencia de trabajar por el bien común y la felicidad de contribuir al progreso de la humanidad ".

El impacto

Ayudar a esta ONG haciendo que la casa de acogida vuelva a tener condiciones decentes y el poder financiar una misión voluntaria adicional, es la mejor manera de proporcionar una ayuda concreta y de estar a su lado.

Otras formas de ayudar

Algunos no pueden contribuir financieramente, no obstante pueden brindar asistencia: pidiendo a su alrededor el poder difundir este mensaje y de dar a conocer esta campaña de sensibilización .

Contamos con ustedes, mil gracias!
story_txt:
Voir Version Française!Leer en Espanol!Short Summary
This is a
project of two friends Pierre and Jean-Louis! ( and Valparaiso behind us !) Pierre le Goff,
a 41 years old French entrepreneur. I graduated in cinema ESSRA school. I also run
industries in food business and pharmaceutical business. I have lived in
Chile for 8 years.
Jean-Louis
Laporte. I am 55 years old social entrepreneur and Engineer.  I am volunteer
in a cancer patient support association.  I am passionated about humanity and
its future. I came to Chile for a period of six months, to be a part of the
Start-up Chile program, in order to launch a project called Spotrotter. 
Pierre : “Making
a documentary about ONG Puntos Corazon opened my eyes to a closed world that we
have neighbors, and we don’t even see them ! Next to us, men and women are suffering
a lot just to survive, and a few others are trying to help, to share. I
couldn't wake up the morning and just go on living like I didn't see anything! Contributors will give more than just hope : they will give a really strong support to those people living very difficult lives and needing money to continue their missions. It's a constant work, and people living in difficult locations need help constantly, most of all, especially the children.”Father Laurent Pavec explain us Puntos Corazon in Valparaiso 

Jean-Louis
"Pierre took me on a tour of Association Puntos Corazon and I was very
touched by the people I encountered in the shanty town of Valparaiso. I met an
elderly person named Don Tito who lives alone, without electricity or running
water on land made of clay; and, I met a paraplegic named Juan who can no
longer move. Volunteers
are giving life to these isolated and excluded people from a precious part
society of humanity. Unfortunately, they lack a volunteer to be able to visit
all those who need it.”Puntos Corazón

“Puntos Corazon” is catholic international NGO,
founded in France in 1990. “Puntos Corazon”
mission is to train and send young volunteers to live for 1 or 2 years in the
center of a deprived area, to be friend of the lonely and isolated people
through a personal one-to-one compassionate approach. They work with the poor,
the most wounded and rejected people in the world. They generate and promote a
“culture of compassion” which affirms the intrinsic value of every person at all
levels of the society through various initiatives in the corporate, political,
scientific and artistic spheres.
What We Need & What You Get
We are looking
for 10,000 US dollars. All the money will go directly in the ONG Puntos’Corazon
bank account.
We will also
make reports about how the money is used. The urgent need is to finance one
more young volunteer in Valparaiso. The volunteers we currently have are really
not enough and we need to finance repairs on house’s floor in the entrance. The
floor and walls were severely damaged after the earthquake and they haven’t
been able to repair them yet.(7200 USD for
one volunteer (600 USD during 12 months) and 2800 USD to repair the house)
All the funds
will go to ONG Puntos Corazon in Valparaiso. If we don’t reach the entire goal we will do the
vital repairs that are urgent ( 2800 USD) 
and we can finance a volunteer but for a 
shorter period.
You can get outstanding reward : receive a blessing for your startup or project ! Father Laurent, head of Puntos Corazon, has asked us how he
could help us because what we do is very useful to them. And we had an idea; for
all the startups and entrepreneur it is important to start off on the right
foot with good luck. So he is going to bless each those who want to be blessed.
Father Laurent proposed  : “ The blessing of offices, shops or factories is
something common in Latin America where the religious sense is strong and very
present among people. Blessing a Start-up and most of all a social Start-up has
a strong meaning. It is recognizing that not everything is in our hand as was
saying Jean-Louis when he commented something about luck. More over, it is
asking god’s help, asking that, as the blessing prayer says, God grants “ His
guidance and support to all who
plan and conduct those Start-ups, to help them take the right decisions and
carry them out fairly, so that by respecting justice and charity, they will see themselves as working
for the common good , and find
joy in contributing to the progress of the world”.
The Impact
The project
helps directly at the people that needed more. Helping this ONG is the best way
to be in the field, with them and to see how they reach their goals.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just
can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:
· Ask
folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
· Remind
them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to itVersion FrançaiseAidons la maison d’accueil
de Puntos Corazon (Points Cœur) à lutter contre les termites et à financer une
mission de volontaire supplémentaire pour soutenir les personnes les plus
nécessiteuses de Valparaiso au Chili.

Bref résumé 
Ce projet est celui de deux amis, Pierre et Jean-Louis (et de tout
Valparaiso derrière eux!).
Pierre Le Goff, entrepreneur français de 41 ans : “Je suis diplômé en
cinéma de l’ESSRA. J’ai également effectué un parcours dans l’industrie
alimentaire, l’industrie pharmaceutique et la restauration. Je vis au Chili
depuis 8 ans”.
Jean-Louis Laporte : “J’ai 55 ans, je suis entrepreneur social et
ingénieur. Je suis bénévole dans une association de soutien aux maladies du
cancer. Je suis passionné par tout ce qui peut améliorer le futur de
l’humanité. Je suis venu au Chili pour une durée de 6 mois, pour participer au
programme Start-up Chile et lancer un projet appelé Spotrotter.
Pierre : “La réalisation d’un documentaire sur l’ONG Puntos Corazon (
Points Cœur) m’ a ouvert les yeux sur tout un monde que nous côtoyons et que
pourtant nous ne voyons pas! Tout près de nous des hommes et des femmes
souffrent et luttent juste pour survivre et quelques autres essaient de les
aider et de partager avec eux.  Je ne
pouvais plus me réveiller tous les matins et continuer à vivre comme si je
n’avais rien vu! Les contributeurs doivent donner plus que de l’espoir : ils
doivent apporter une aide concrète à toutes ces personnes confrontées à
l’adversité et aux volontaires qui ont besoin de moyens financiers pour mener à
bien leurs missions. C’est un travail de chaque jour et les personnes vivant
ces difficultés, les enfants en particulier ont besoin d’un soutien constant”. 
Jean-Louis : “Pierre m’a présenté l’association Points Coeur et j’ai été
particulièrement touché par les personnes que j’ai rencontrées dans les
bidonvilles de Valparaiso. J’ai fait la connaissance d’un vieux monsieur, Don
Tito, vivant seul sans électricité ni eau courante sur un sol en terre battue.
J’ai également rencontré  un paraplégique
nommé Juan qui ne peut plus se déplacer. Les volontaires donnent toute leur vie
pour ces personnes isolées et quasiment exclues de la société des hommes.
Malheureusement, il manqué des volontaires pour visiter tous ceux qui en auraient
tant besoin”.
L’association Puntos
Corazon (Points Cœur) en quelques mots 
“Puntos Corazon” (Points Coeur) est une ONG international fondée en France
en 1990. La mission de “Puntos Corazon” est de former et d’envoyer de jeunes
volontaires vivre 1 ou 2 ans dans des banlieues défavorisées, et d’apporter
compassion et soutien personnalisé aux plus isolés. Ils œuvrent auprès des
populations les plus pauvres, les plus vulnérables et les plus exclues du
monde. Ils génèrent et répandent une “culture de compassion” qui met en avant
la valeur intrinsèque de chaque personne, grâce à diverses initiatives dans le
monde de l’entreprise, de la politique, des arts et des sciences.
Ce dont nous avons
besoin et ce que vous pouvez faire
Nous avons besoin de 10,000 US dollars. La totalité de cette somme sera
versée sur le compte bancaire de l’ONG Puntos Corazon.
Nous ferons des comptes rendus sur l’utilisation de ces fonds. 
Le besoin le plus urgent est de financer un jeune volontaire de plus à Valparaiso.
Ceux actuellement présents sont en nombre insuffisant. Nous devons également financer
les travaux du sol et les murs de l’entrée de la maison sévèrement endommagés
par les termites et le dernier tremblement de terre. Les travaux n’ont pas pu
être lancés faute de moyens financiers (il faut 600 USD par mois pour un
volontaire soit 7,200 USD pour un an , et 2,800 USD pour les travaux de la
maison).
Si nous n’obtenons pas la totalité de cette somme, nous ferons en priorité
les réparations du bâtiment, car il y a urgence, et nous financerons un
volontaire pour une durée plus courte.
Vous pouvez
bénéficier d’une récompense hors du commun : la bénédiction de votre start-up
ou de votre projet !
Le père Laurent, responsable de Points Cœur, nous a demandé comment il
pouvait nous aider car ce que nous faisons est vraiment très utile pour
l’association.
Nous avons eu une idée : pour toutes les start-ups, ainsi que pour tous les
porteurs de projets, il est important de partir du bon pied et sous une bonne
étoile. Le père Laurent a donc décidé de donner sa bénédiction à tous ceux qui
le souhaiteront.
Le Père Laurent précise : “Les bénédictions de
magasins, de bureaux ou d’entreprises sont courantes en Amérique Latine où le
sentiment religieux est très présent dans la population. Bénir une start-up et
surtout une start-up à vocation sociale est porteur d’un sens fort. C’est
reconnaître que tout notre destin n’est pas entre nos mains, comme le dit si
bien Jean-Louis lorsqu’il évoque la Chance. Surtout, c’est demander l’aide de
Dieu, et comme le dit le texte de la bénédiction c’est demander “qu’il guide
ceux qui dirigent  ces start-ups, les
aide à prendre les bonnes décisions et à se comporter de manière équitable.
Ainsi, en respectant les principes de justice et charité, ces entrepreneurs
auront la conscience de travailler pour le bien commun et le bonheur de
contribuer au progrès de l’humanité.”

L’impact
Aider cette ONG en rendant la maison d’accueil dans un état décent et en
finançant la mission d’un volontaire supplémentaire est la meilleure manière
d’apporter une aide concrète sur le terrain, et d’être à leurs côtés. 
Les autres manières
d’apporter son aide
Certains ne peuvent pas contribuer financièrement, mais ils peuvent
cependant apporter leur aide :
- en demandant autour d’eux de diffuser le message et de faire connaître
cette campagne.
Nous comptons sur vous tous, mille merci !!!Version Espanol:Ayudemos la casa de acogida de “Puntos Corazón”
a luchar contra las termitas y para financiar una misión de voluntarios

story:
Irene Johnson, mother of Terry Johnson, passed in the middle of night on June 2, 2015 due to ongoing medical complications. Irene was widowed at a young age, when her husband died at 36. She was a fighter, as she worked in the cotton gin factory to provide for her children. Irene, had to endure many struggles in her life so we want to honor her with the proper burial she deserves.

Due to the hefty expense to bury Irene, Terry needs the support of the community in order to give her a proper burial. We ask that you donate to alleviate the cost and burden of the Johnson family while they mourn the lost of their mother.

story: Fundraising for a disabled veteran who needs funds for home loan expenses.
